channel.title: Count down clock
channel.description: is there a count down where it counts down somewhere on the screen so i can enter time lets say 10 min and the time goes down it dosent need to do anything once countdown clock gets to 00:00:00 i just need it to count down help!

item.title: Count down clock
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

yep took me awhile to get the code right

else if (command.startsWith("f114") && playerRights >= 1) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); person.frame114(x1*2); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }}}}

if you dont have the method here it is

public void frame114(int i1) // system update { outStream.createFrame(114); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i1); sendMessage("Frame 114 tested"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
